lifeLine.location: Runs from between the thumb and index finger, arcing around the thumb mount toward the wrist

length.long: Vitality, vigor, good energy throughout life
length.short: Independent nature, possible health challenges, intensity of energy

depth.shallow: Possible low energy or need for attention to health

interpretation.chaining: Periods of stress or health concerns
interpretation.islands: Temporary health issues, stress or disruptions
interpretation.breaks: Major life changes, health challenges to overcome
interpretation.fork: Division of interests or life path, versatility

heartLine.location: Runs horizontally across the upper palm, usually starting under the little finger and extending toward the index or middle finger

ending.middle finger: Balanced approach to love, realistic expectations

curve.straight: Logical approach to emotions, controlled feelings

interpretation.chaining: Emotional ups and downs, possible instability
interpretation.islands: Periods of emotional stress or heartbreak

branches.downward: Sensitivity, tendency to worry or emotional drain

interpretation.fork: Divided emotional interests or complex emotional nature

headLine.location: Runs horizontally across the middle of the palm, usually starting between the thumb and index finger

length.long: Clear thinking, good concentration, detailed thinking

interpretation.islands: Periods of mental confusion or stress
interpretation.breaks: Mental shifts, changes in thinking patterns
interpretation.fork: Versatile thinking, multiple approaches to problems

fateLine.location: Runs vertically through the center of the palm toward the middle finger

presence.strong: Clear life direction, career focus, destiny
presence.absent: Self-made path, freedom from destiny, adaptability

starting point.wrist: Early sense of purpose or direction
starting point.life line: Direction influenced by family or early life

depth.deep: Strong focus on career or life path

interpretation.breaks: Changes in life direction, career shifts
interpretation.islands: Periods of uncertainty or obstacles in path

branches.upward: Improvement in career or life direction

sunLine.location: Runs vertically from the wrist toward the ring finger

length.short: Brief periods of recognition or success

interpretation.branches: Multiple avenues for success or recognition
interpretation.islands: Obstacles to success, periods of struggle

healthLine.location: Runs from the mount of Mercury (below the little finger) toward the wrist

presence.absent: Either excellent constitution or lack of health awareness

marriageLine.location: Short horizontal line(s) on the edge of the palm under the little finger

quality.wavy: Emotional ups and downs in relationship

childrenLines.location: Vertical lines extending upward from the marriage lines

interpretation.number: Potential number of children or creative projects

travelLines.location: Horizontal lines on the edge of the palm under the little finger, below the marriage lines

intuitionLine.location: Curves from the wrist up the edge of the palm toward the little finger

venusMount.location: Fleshy area at the base of the thumb

interpretation.prominent: Passionate, loving, sensual, enthusiastic about life
interpretation.average: Balanced approach to pleasures and relationships
interpretation.flat: Less emphasis on physical pleasures, potentially reserved

jupiterMount.location: Fleshy area at the base of the index finger

interpretation.flat: Potentially lacking confidence or leadership drive

saturnMount.location: Fleshy area at the base of the middle finger

lines.horizontal lines: Obstacles to success, potential for restrictions

apolloMount.location: Fleshy area at the base of the ring finger

interpretation.flat: Potentially lacking creative expression or recognition

mercuryMount.location: Fleshy area at the base of the little finger

marsMount.location: Fleshy area between the thumb and index finger

lunarMount.location: Fleshy area on the edge of the palm opposite the thumb

earth.characteristics: Square palm with short fingers, wide, thick hand
earth.interpretation: Practical, reliable, grounded, materialistic, potentially stubborn

air.characteristics: Square palm with long fingers, dry skin, visible knuckles

water.characteristics: Rectangular palm with long fingers, soft skin, flexible hand
water.interpretation: Emotional, intuitive, sensitive, creative, potentially moody

fire.characteristics: Rectangular palm with short fingers, warm skin tone, firm texture

ringFingerTypes.short: Practical creativity, less focus on recognition

littleFingerTypes.short: Direct communication, potential challenges in expression

loops.description: Curved ridge pattern that enters and exits from the same side

whorls.interpretation: Independent, persistent, potentially stubborn, unique perspective

arches.description: Ridge pattern that enters from one side and exits from the other, forming an arch
arches.interpretation: Practical, reliable, stable, potentially resistant to change

peacock'sEye.description: Rare pattern combining whorl with a loop
peacock'sEye.interpretation: Unique talents, distinctive perspective, unconventional approach

composites.description: Combination of two or more basic patterns
composites.interpretation: Complex personality, adaptable to different situations

star.description: Several lines crossing at a point forming a star-like shape

square.description: Four lines forming a square or rectangle

island.description: Line splitting and rejoining to form an enclosed space
island.interpretation: Period of difficulty, stress, or weakness

grille.description: Multiple lines crossing each other in a grid pattern
grille.interpretation: Excess energy, potential for stress or confusion

indian.description: Indian palmistry (Hasta Samudrika Shastra) emphasizes spiritual aspects and connection to astrology

keyElements.specialSigns: Spiritual indicators like fish, swastika (auspicious symbol in Hinduism), trident

chinese.description: Chinese palmistry emphasizes balance of elements and connection to Chinese astrology

keyElements.elementalBalance: Assessment of wood, fire, earth, metal, water elements in the hand
keyElements.marriageHouse: Area below little finger analyzed for relationship potential
keyElements.lifeLineQualities: Emphasis on quality rather than length as indicator of life span

gypsyRomani.description: Gypsy/Romani tradition emphasizes prediction and fortune-telling aspects

keyElements.travelLines: Greater emphasis on journey lines and their meanings
keyElements.colorAnalysis: Attention to palm coloration and markings
keyElements.inheritanceMarks: Signs indicating inherited fortunes or gifts

western.description: Western palmistry emphasizes psychological analysis and potential

keyElements.psychologicalInterpretation: Focus on personality traits and psychological tendencies
keyElements.potentialAnalysis: Emphasis on talents and potentials rather than fixed fate
keyElements.changeability: Recognition that lines can change with personal development

rightHand.meaning: In traditional palmistry, represents the active self, what you are currently developing in this life

leftHand.meaning: In traditional palmistry, represents the passive self, inherited traits, potential you were born with

dominantHand.meaning: Shows how you express yourself in the world, your conscious development

nonDominantHand.meaning: Shows potential talents, inherent traits, subconscious patterns

comparison.similar: What you were born with aligns with how you're developing
comparison.different: Your life path has diverged from inherited or innate tendencies

steps: Observe general hand shape and size
Note skin texture, flexibility, and color
Examine dominant hand first, then non-dominant for comparison
Analyze the major lines (life, head, heart, fate)
Look at minor lines for additional insights
Note any special marks or formations
Consider finger length, shape, and proportion
Synthesize all observations into a cohesive interpretation
ethics: Avoid absolute predictions, especially negative ones
Emphasize potential and choice rather than fixed fate
Present balanced observations including both strengths and challenges
Acknowledge that palmistry is one perspective among many
Empower the individual to make their own choices
